name: You Are Not Immune To Lava
name_original: You Are Not Immune To Lava
description:
You Are Not Immune To Lava is my first game to finally be completed. I have been working on it on and off for 2-3 years now and I am finally pleased to present the finished product.

YANITL is a masochistic, hardcore, 2d platformer in the same vein as Super Meat Boy. It's a hard game. Really hard. I'm not saying this for hyperbole. Rest assured that all of the levels are 100% possible, no matter how much you swear they aren't.

Thank you for playing and (hopefully) enjoying my game. Please leave any feedback and report any bugs you may find to me at my tumblr blog: www.8bitstickmod.tumblr.com

You can also purchase the soundtrack for YANITL here on my bandcamp:
https://nanoco1000.bandcamp.com/album/you-are-not-immune-to-soundtrack

CONTROLS:

WASD/Arrow Keys/Spacebar: Movement
O: Reset the whole game
P: Level select
M: Mute music (I won't hold it against you)
